name: "After Effects"
flavor: "Nothing that happens in the Crucible is irreversible…except the lessons you learn."

name: "Ancestral Demise"
flavor: Humanity's rich and tattered history provides fuel for libraries of debate on Light, the Traveler, and all creation.

name: "Blind Evoke"
flavor: "Learning without application is like drinking without thirst." - from Aphorisms To Anger Warlocks, a Hunter handbook

name: "Blood Maturity"
flavor: "I have found that rarest treasure: a pragmatic Warlock." - Saint-14

name: "Born of Sight"
flavor: "Reality is the most ruthless analyst." - Praxic saying

name: "Circle of War"
flavor: "Understanding is not an end, but a beginning from which new truths are born."

name: "Computable Secrets"
flavor: Exo Warlocks take particular interest in the physics of Light, seeing analogy to their own origins.

name: "Controversial Remains"
flavor: Like all Guardians, Warlocks are vessels for the Traveler's Light. But that power must be mastered.

name: "Cosmic Truths"
flavor: "To bind Light into the same framework as the proton or the mere neutrino is an act of close-minded hubris."

name: "Creation's Wind"
flavor: "The Light releases us from causality. It smooths the contours of what we can and cannot do."

name: "Cryptic and Ineffable"
flavor: "You did not receive the bond so you could babble arcane words. Go forth, and burn our enemy."

name: "Curse of the Hidden"
flavor: "I vowed to avenge them all, and this curse I will carry to my final death." - Eriana-3

name: "Death of Fate"
flavor: "Our fate is not sealed. With the proper will, and enough force, it can be rewritten."

name: "Dispersed Vengeance"
flavor: "I made quite a reputation in the Crucible. Spent some time trying to outrun it." - Ikora Rey

name: "Dread's Enmity"
flavor: "They've stolen our worlds. In return, would you not send their ether to the winds? I would. I have."

name: "Emerald Light"
flavor: "They'll believe you are one of their own. And that is the only way." - Toland, the Shattered

name: "Eternal Light"
flavor: "You stand for something immutable and transcendent. Act like it." - reprimand to a younger Ikora Rey

name: "Existential Threats"
flavor: Furious debate divides those that seek knowledge in order to aid the City, and those who seek knowledge for its own sake.

name: "Expansion"
flavor: Always consider the connection between your field work and vaster things.

name: "Eye of History"
flavor: Those orders most closely allied with the Titans seek to hone the battlefield deployment of Light.

name: "Faceless Demise"
flavor: A true leader speaks with the voice of the people.

name: "Forgotten Force"
flavor: Every exercise of your power adds a syllable to the greater song.

name: "House of Devils"
flavor: "What shall we call thee?"

name: "House of Kings"
flavor: "Have they not learned the fate of Earth's kings?"

name: "House of Wolves"
flavor: "Beware of false prophets."

name: "Immanent War"
flavor: "The next war is already here, waged in the theater of the inmost."

name: "Inertia Engine"
flavor: "I believe that the Traveler and its Light are advanced technology. I refuse to accept that this diminishes me."

name: "Light Beyond"
flavor: "Every light that marks the abyss offers hope against the rising tide."

name: "Light Unknown"
flavor: The bond is signified and signifier, source and focus. Do not seek closure. Let the mystery unfold you.

name: "Loop of Night"
flavor: "I could flense you apart, molecule by squirming molecule. It is within my power." - Toland the Shattered

name: "Metastability Event"
flavor: The great energies of the Golden Age never triggered a false vacuum decay. We'll be fine.

name: "Mirrors of Chaos"
flavor: If the City falls, there will be no one left to adjudicate phenomenological debates. So now, even the scholars fight.

name: "Mystic Drain"
flavor: At the desperate battle of Twilight Gap, Warlocks worked in concert to shatter the enemy. It was not quite enough.

name: "No Footprints"
flavor: "Gravity? Oh, that nuisance. I never bother with it." —Lyssa, the Lighthearted

name: "No Tomorrow"
flavor: "For every dead yesterday there waits a new dawn, with no promise of tomorrow."

name: "One True Constant"
flavor: Some orders eschew all metaphysics and ontological doctrine in favor of pure combat discipline.

name: "Other Side of Nothing"
flavor: "Nobody comes back the same."- The Parables of Osiris

name: "Paradox and Truth"
flavor: "The Light remade us. Can I still claim to be human? Can you still say you were made by human hands?"

name: "Phantom Wisdom"
flavor: "What is Light? Who made it? How does it work? Light itself answers these questions. Do you understand?"

name: "Praxic Thunder"
flavor: With knowledge, purpose. Each sharpens and hones the other.

name: "Praxic Vim"
flavor: Praxic Warlocks don't hate research. They just don't let it interfere with the fight.

name: "Red Eternal"
flavor: Death is the fate of all life. We only shorten the way.

name: "Ritual Expansion"
flavor: "Beyond Sol's gravity, beyond Earth's pull." —Arach Jalaal

name: "Song of Dusk"
flavor: "I'll be the last Light they ever see." - Eriana-3

name: "Song of the Light"
flavor: At the edge of the singularity, light freezes, unable to face the mystery. But you must go on.

name: "The Age to Come"
flavor: "There is strength in unity. And a King of many, will be the King of all."

name: "The Before Time"
flavor: "Do you remember who you were?"

name: "The Calming"
flavor: "I have devised a technique to liberate the soul from the flesh. It works very reliably on Fallen."

name: "The Chaos Constant"
flavor: "Darkness consumes, but, we shall mark the abyss with eternal fire."

name: "The Conflagration"
flavor: Everything was born from an unimaginable fire. Here, I'll show you.

name: "The Cure"
flavor: "We have a solution." - Ikora Rey, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

name: "The Gone"
flavor: "He came at me with a knife. I put out my hand and - just so - made him into ash."

name: "The Order"
flavor: "A fractured will is the hallmark of disorder…"

name: "The Risen Ones"
flavor: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

name: "The Tethering"
flavor: "The farther apart you pull two quarks, the harder they snap back."

name: "The Transcendent Mind"
flavor: "Other orders try to learn the laws of Light. We accept that Light transcends all law."

name: "The Unconquerable"
flavor: "Let's stop thinking about how to open the lock and start thinking about removing the wall."

name: "The Waking Dreams"
flavor: Awoken Warlocks ponder their own visions as whispers into the truths of Light and Dark.

name: "Tooth and Claw"
flavor: Reality grew from the carcasses of an infinity of might-have-beens.

name: "Trained Chaos"
flavor: "Control space and time. Mere matter and energy will follow."

name: "Twist of Fate"
flavor: "There will come a time when you can no longer see objects - only clouds of probability and law."

name: "Variable Flow"
flavor: "Your power flows through the bond. Remember what it represents."

name: "Wearable Collider"
flavor: Mm, yes, a fine cloak. But I have a supercompressed supercollider on my arm. Can your cloak split quarks?

name: "Willful Exodus"
flavor: "…'til even the stars heed our calling."

name: "Worm Gods' Boon"
flavor: They had a choice. They chose the hunger. They chose the Formless One. They chose the Worm Gods.

name: Barkhan Dune Bond
flavor: "The sandstorm that buries Meridian will unearth Vasconia." —Warlock saying

name: Binary Lazarus
flavor: Encrypted by the First Children at the Precipice of Flame, before the Exile.

name: Bond of Control
flavor: A Warlock's bond signifies control over the Traveler's Light. What 'control' means is a matter of debate.

name: Bond of Credulity
flavor: "They call me unorthodox. I call them boring." —Wen Jie

name: Bond of Emptying
flavor: Peace within. War without.

name: Bond of Focus
flavor: A bond is symbol, instrument, and warning. Light can reveal mysteries. But even a child knows not to stare into the sun.

name: Bond of Guardians
flavor: Bearing the devices of every Guardian class, this escutcheon represents Light united against Darkness.

name: Bond of Polarity
flavor: Some orders believe that Light and Darkness exist beyond the merely material, with a logic of their own.

name: Bond of Preparation
flavor: A Warlock needs nothing but a vigorous mind.

name: Bond of the Desolate
flavor: In honor of the Queen.

name: Bond of the Exile
flavor: "They who entered the Speaker's chambers as master and apprentice were bitter rivals when they left." —Brother Vance

name: Bond of the Fen
flavor: There's nothing out there. So why do we keep going back?

name: Bond of the Queen's Guard
flavor: One throne beneath the howling dark.

name: Bond of the Tilt
flavor: "Don't want to get rusty now, do we?" —Ikora Rey

name: Bond of the Universal
flavor: Some orders argue that Light and Darkness can be explained in the context of supersymmetric physics.

name: Bond of the Uprooted
flavor: Cut away the rot. Let the young trees take root.

name: Bond of the Wormlore
flavor: "They were two once. In the Darkness they joined. Such is the Hive's strength. And such is their hunger." —Eris Morn

name: Bond of Unknowing
flavor: Some orders assert that Light and Darkness are not bound by any system of reason or causality.

name: Bond of Veils
flavor: A thousand Thanatonauts on a thousand journeys have made only the tiniest of tears in death's veil.

name: Bond of Will
flavor: "Consider the word: bond. Remember, as you wield this power, that you are not alone." - Pujari, The Transcripts

name: Bond of Wonders
flavor: "The more unlikely it seems, the truer it is." —Wen Jie

name: Bone Circlet
flavor: A memento of the world Crota ruled.

name: Captured Solar Remnant
flavor: A grid of starfire burned into a single instant of Planck time.

name: Devils' Bond
flavor: Make your mark.

name: Ebonthorn Bond
flavor: "As the thorns tear your skin, so Oryx tears your soul." —Toland, the Shattered

name: Felwinter's Iron Bond
flavor: "Such knowledge is often deemed offensive. That doesn't make it untrue."

name: Fragment of the Prime
flavor: Caged in ascendant motes, it still glimmers with the light of some ceaseless calculation.

name: Haliaetus Bond
flavor: "Nowhere to land. Gotta keep flying."

name: Harlequin Pendulum
flavor: A curious device, sought after by the Gensym Scribes.

name: Heliopause Bond
flavor: "Once, deep space explorers were seen as heroes. Now, for suggesting humanity should look beyond this system, some call us cowards." —Arach Parnell

name: Incandescent Mind
flavor: A tiny engine, bright with thought...

name: Infinite Lines Bond
flavor: ...pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Iron Camelot Bond
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Skorri, she who sang out the Iron Song.

name: Kallipolis Bond
flavor: The leader we need is among us, not above us.

name: Keeper's Dread
flavor: "I feel the Queen's presence still. I think she would approve of what we do in her name." —Petra Venj

name: Kells' Bond
flavor: One leads. Many follow.

name: Kings' Bond
flavor: My word is my oath.

name: Lantern Bond
flavor: This bond represents the one thing Albios took with him into the swamp: a single lantern.

name: Omnigul Bond
flavor: "The Will of Crota is broken at last. May Sai Mota's restless Light at last find peace." —Eris Morn

name: Order of Guardians Bond
flavor: "Just because Warlocks are the superior Guardian class doesn't mean we can't be team players."

name: Orphan Branch
flavor: It's down to us now.

name: Pariah Bond
flavor: "I wear his symbols proudly in the City, to remind them that Osiris is not truly gone." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Potential Bond
flavor: A Warlock's Bond is both a symbol and a focus of power. Your Ghost jury-rigged this simple example.

name: Racer's Bond
flavor: Is it a flash of insight or merely a spark from your bond?

name: Seal of the Twin Eagle
flavor: Only the wind beneath you.

name: Seraph Bond
flavor: "Some of the City folk call us angels. Others...take a different view."

name: Skorri's Iron Bond
flavor: "Rise above, so that you may lift those below."

name: Spektar Bond
flavor: There are many shades of truth.

name: Spektar Haliaetus Bond
flavor: "Nowhere to land. Gotta keep flying."

name: Spektar Heliopause Bond
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Spektar Infinite Bond
flavor: …pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Spektar Kallipolis Bond
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Spirit of the Vulture
flavor: Before grace, subsistence. Before nobility, survival.

name: Stormcaller Bond
flavor: You are the calm eye of the dire storm.

name: Stormcaller's Bond
flavor: "Let me tell you what I wish someone had told me in my early years: embrace the stillness." —Ikora Rey

name: Sublime Light Bond
flavor: A trial by fire, the purpose of which is transformation.

name: Subterranean Bond
flavor: "Ziggurats built not on the surface, but gouged, upside-down, into the Moon's crust." —Eris Morn

name: Sunsinger's Bond
flavor: Any scholar can understand the theory, but only those who hear the music can make Light sing.

name: Terra Clasp
flavor: The Earth is ours to lose.

name: Thanatonaut's Bond
flavor: There's always a gap in the memories.

name: The Five Lives of Albios
flavor: Woven to honor the last stand of Albios.

name: Thought Lantern
flavor: We are here to cast a little light.

name: Timor's Iron Bond
flavor: "Only those forged in Light can stand against the lurking shadows."

name: Ulan-Tan's Burial Ring
flavor: A replica of the legendary burial ring of Ulan-Tan.

name: Union of the Consensus
flavor: A symbol of union worn by chosen Warlocks in the great Consensus.

name: Voidwalker's Bond
flavor: "Others flee from the Darkness. Only we dare stare into its depths."

name: Wellspring Bond
flavor: A Guardian in the wilds is better than water in the desert.

name: White Polygon Construct
flavor: A strange holographic bond. The information within describes something vast.

name: Wolfswood Bond
flavor: Under a red dawn, the Iron Wolves gathered beneath the Ironwood.

name: Endling Bond
flavor: "I am haunted by the Endling, the last living human." —Arach Jalaal

name: High Command Bond
flavor: "The City demands a leader. Now, before it is too late." —Executor Hideo

name: Eon Tracer Bond
flavor: "We trace the history of war throughout the ages." —Lakshmi-2

name: Sepiks Deposed Bond
flavor: "Prime no longer. No primes but we."

name: Red Miasma Bond
flavor: Just give it a directive, and it won't stop until it gets a new directive. ~SIVA.MEM.WB008

name: Iron Saga Bond
flavor: "The worlds still need the Iron Lords." —Lord Saladin

name: Idylls of the Iron Lords
flavor: "The tale of the Iron Lords is not over." —Lord Saladin Forge

name: Cobra's Vigil Bond
flavor: "We learn to live with this poison in our veins." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Bond of the Exile
flavor: "They who entered the Speaker's chambers as master and apprentice were bitter rivals when they left." —Brother Vance

name: Bond of Legends
flavor: The Warlock worthy of this bond has learned the secrets of every planet and heard the song of every star.
